Event.name: Request_entity
Event.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Customer</fen> requests an <fen>Entity</fen> from a <fen>Supplier</fen>. The <fen>Customer</fen> can order the <fen>Entity</fen> himself or via a <fen>Medium</fen>. <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Cust">I</fex> <t>ordered</t> <fex name="Ent">a black scarf</fex> <fex name="S">from J. Crew</fex> <fex name="Time">a week ago</fex>.</ex> <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Cust">Mr. Strom's</fex> <t><fex name="Ent">order</fex></t> has been cancelled.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Customer
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Customer</fen> is the person or business ordering the <fen>Entity</fen> from the <fen>Supplier</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Cust">Simone</fex> <t>ordered</t> a hamburger and fries.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Entity
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The object ordered by the <fen>Customer</fen>.
<ex>Liz <t>ordered</t> <fex name="Ent">a new espresso maker</fex> for the office.</ex>
<ex>His <t><fex name="Ent">order</fex></t> did not arrive on time.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Medium
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The channel used by the <fen>Customer</fen> to transmit the request.
<ex>Harold <t>ordered</t> the material <fex name="Med">via email</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Supplier
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person or organization from whom the <fen>Customer</fen> orders the <fen>Entity</fen>.
<ex>Mrs. Apfelbaum <t>ordered</t> a coffee <fex name="S">from the barista</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Customer</fen> requested the <fen>Entity</fen>.
<ex>Sara placed the <t>order</t> <fex name="Time">three days ago</fex>. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Beneficiary
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person or organization which benefits from the <fen>Entity</fen>.
<ex>Rose <t>ordered</t> a new computer <fex name="Bene">for Mr. Cooper</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The Manner in which the request is placed.
<ex>Mr. Shaw <fex name="Man">hastily</fex> <t>ordered</t> the first thing he saw on the menu.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An action performed by the <fen>Customer</fen> that results in a request being made.
<ex>Cheri accidently <t>ordered</t> the jacket <fex name="Means">by clicking on the link</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

lexUnit.name: order.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to request an object from someone, usually in exchange for money

lexUnit.name: order.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a request for something to be served

lexUnit.name: order [physical object].n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a physical entity (usually a document) requested to be fulfilled
